title: Tip #7 Recharge, Relight
author: Tom Price
content: Try durable re-usable “Light-Toys” and re-chargeable batteries Instead of cheap disposable blinky lights and glow sticks. Check out cool blinky bling bling like this: http://powerflare.com/. You’ll see me sporting one of these in BRC this year. Search the web on your engine of choice for more ideas and pass them along. – Blue
